Uses of Package
xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels

  • Packages that use xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates provides several aggregate functions for nonparametric estimators.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels provides concrete kernels and abstract modellings.
  • Classes in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels used by xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates 
    Class and Description
    HybridKernelCDF
    This class provides an implementation of a kernel based estimator for a cumulative distribution function (cdf).
    KernelFunction
    This class provides the usage of kernel functions for statistical purposes.
    NativeKernelCDF
    This class implements an abstract preimplementation of a kernel based cdf estimator AbstractKernelCDF that doesn't use an explicit technique for avoiding boundary effects.
    NativeKernelDensityEstimator
    This class implements an abstract preimplementation of a kernel based pdf estimator AbstractKernelDensityEstimator that doesn't use an explicit technique for avoiding boundary effects.
    ReflectionKernelCDF
    This class implements an abstract preimplementation of a kernel based cdf estimator AbstractKernelCDF that uses reflection for avoiding boundary effects.
    ReflectionKernelDensityEstimator
    This class implements an abstract preimplementation of a kernel based pdf estimator AbstractKernelDensityEstimator that uses reflection for avoiding boundary effects.
  • Classes in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels used by xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels 
    Class and Description
    AbstractKernelCDF
    One main problem of nonparametric statistics is the estimation of the probability density function (pdf) of a random variable.
    AbstractKernelDensityEstimator
    One main problem of nonparametric statistics is the estimation of the probability density function (pdf) of a random variable.
    HybridKernelCDF
    This class provides an implementation of a kernel based estimator for a cumulative distribution function (cdf).
    KernelFunction
    This class provides the usage of kernel functions for statistical purposes.
    KernelFunctionND
    Classes implementing this interface provide a n-dimensional kernel function evaluating objects of type double [] representing a n-dimensional real-valued vector.
    ProductKernelFunction
    This class provides the product of a given one-dimensional kernel function for using it as a n-dimensional real-valued kernel function as modelled in KernelFunctionND.
    TransformedKernelFunction
    This class provides a transformation of a one-dimensional kernel function with restricted support to [-1,1] like the epanechnikow kernel function or the biweight kernel function to an interval given by [l,l+c].
